medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset of acral paresthesia and imbalance.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began suddenly; the patient reported progressive symptoms over a month. Intensity increased, leading to severe unsteadiness when walking and inability to tandem. Reflexes were absent, and sensations were reduced in a length-dependent pattern up to mid-shin and wrists.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Family history of Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease type 1A (CMT1A) with PMP22 duplication; the patient tested positive for the mutation but was asymptomatic prior to this incident.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease type 1A (CMT1A) (PMP22 duplication).
